titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Queer Periodicals Collection,
1966 - 1998
titlestmt.author: Processed by: Anna Colvin (Wesleyan class of 2004), Martha Fleming-Ives '2005, Dael Norwood '2004, Cristin Quealy '2004, Mike Sanfilippo '2005, Anne Thompson '2002, Aaron Welo '2004, Margaret Patton and Jeffrey Makala.; machine-readable finding aid created by: Andrea Benefiel

Machine-readable finding aid derived from XML authoring program.
Date of source: December 2008

titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Queer Periodicals Collection, 1966 - 1998
titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Special Collections and Archives, Wesleyan University

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: The Queer Periodicals Collection contains over 490 different gay, lesbian, bisexual, and transgender periodicals published between 1966 and 1998. The bulk consists of English-language titles from the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom, though examples from the European continent, Russia, and Israel are also present. The extent of each title may vary from a single issue to several complete (or near-complete) volumes. The collection is arranged into three separate series by size, and alphabetically by title thereunder

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Queer Periodicals Collection, Collection #1000-65, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Anna Colvin (Wesleyan class of 2004), Martha Fleming-Ives '2005, Dael Norwood '2004, Cristin Quealy '2004, Mike Sanfilippo '2005, Anne Thompson '2002, Aaron Welo '2004, Margaret Patton and Jeffrey Makala., 2004

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issues of over 490 different gay, lesbian, bisexual, and transgender periodicals published between 1966 and 1998. The bulk consists of English-language titles from the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom, though examples from the European continent, Russia, and Israel are also present. The extent of each title may vary from a single issue to several complete (or near-complete) volumes. The collection is arranged into three separate series by size, and alphabetically by title thereunder.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: In the Box List, each title's contents are listed at the issue level. The first and last issues of each volume generally include an added date for reference. For longer runs of a single title, the first and last issues contained in each box are also listed by date. Titles that have been published with incorrect issue statements are listed, with a correction in parentheses if necessary. Multiple copies of a single issue are occasionally present in the collection, and have been noted. Some dates have been supplied for titles and appear in parenthesis. A comprehensive city/state/country index has been added to this finding aid, as well as a separate timeline that can be used to locate titles by publication date or date range.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: A list of publications organized geographically is available: http://www.wesleyan.edu/libr/schome/FAs/location_index.pdf.
A timeline of publication dates is available: http://www.wesleyan.edu/libr/schome/FAs/1000-65-timeline.pdf
